definitions.definition: A kitchenware utensil for cutting ball-shaped pieces of foods.
A person employed to divide molten metal into separate balls before it is hammered out.
One who plays basketball ( US ) or association football ( UK ).
One who has swag and lives an extravagant lifestyle.
examples: Did you see that car? He’s such a baller .

definitions.definition: Ellipsis of baller band , a silicone rubber wristband , originating as a basketball sports wristband .

main_definition: A kitchenware utensil for cutting ball-shaped pieces of foods.
secondary_definitions: A person employed to divide molten metal into separate balls before it is hammered out.
( sports , slang ) One who plays basketball ( US ) or association football ( UK ).
( African-American Vernacular , slang ) One who has swag and lives an extravagant lifestyle.
( Philippines , fashion , colloquial ) Ellipsis of baller band , a silicone rubber wristband , originating as a basketball sports wristband .
